ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine knew Shadow Wing had the advantage in tne air, all he could do to avoid her was stay in the high grass and trees, he tried to keep her upwind so he

Lunarpine knew Shadow Wing had the advantage in tne air, all he could 
do to avoid her was stay in the high grass and trees, he tried to 
keep her upwind so he could smell her. She swept low, he moved to the 
side, trying his damndest to stay ahead of her. In the wild the beast 
had to stay ahead of the hunter, or end up lunch. Even though they 
were only playing, he had to be a wolf, in both actions and reactions.

"Catch me if you can Wing, If you're beast enough." Lunarpine had to 
rattle her chains a little, if she couldn't handle a little ribbing 
then she couldn't handle a real fight. The soldier in him had to know 
for sure who he could depend on when the firefight began.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Logo morph" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She laughed."Oh really? We'll see about that!" She flew off after 
him. 
> Weaving in and out of trees, with a smirk on her face and 
determinded to tag 
> him back.  "I'll get you yet." she said with a chuckle in her 
voice. She 
> felt the owl in her self start to fly again. She had a smile on her 
face and 
> the wind under her wings.  She saw him running along just ahead of 
her.  He 
> looked happy and free.  He was like a puppy again.  Running with 
the wind in 
> his face and his tongue hanging out.  She laughed. He looked happy 
to just 
> be running again. Without worry or care, just having fun again.  
She flew 
> after him and came up behind him.
> "I'm going to catch you."
> 
> ---Original message---
> From:   <cyberwolf4@p...>
> Date: Wed Jul 5, 2000 7:08pm
> Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
> 
> 
> "I'd like that," Was Lunarpines response,"Better yet, how about a
> game of tag,I haven't tracked airborne prey in a long time."
> Lunarpine was anxious for a challenge, and a little fun.
> 
> "Oh by the way, "YOU'RE IT" he reached up and gave Shadow Wing a
> smack, as he transformed to Wolf mode and ran off. (What part of
> Africa are we in?)
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
